StatDef.label: bladder strength
StatDef.description: Bladder strength determines how much control a pawn has over their bladder.\n\nIt reduces the chance of unfortunate accidents.

StatDef.label: bedwetting modifier
StatDef.description: Describes the chance this pawn will develop issues with bedwetting in their lifetime.\n\nShould they do so, this will only cause issues while being asleep.Night time protection is recommended in such cases.
